text:
This austerity is related with the worship of lord Parshuram who is also famous as Jamdagnya.
It is cele- brated on the twelfth day of the bright half of the hindu month-vaishakh.
Before commencing the rituals, a devotee should purify himself by taking a bath and then worship an idol of lord Parshuram kept on a pot filled with water.
While worshipping he should make offerings of various articles tothe deity-flowers, sandalwood,ardhya,etc.
It is mandatory to remain awake for the whole night.
On the following day,he should donate the idol to a brahmin.
A devotee who observes a fast on this day gets all his wishes fulfilled and attains to Brahma loka.
title: Jamadagnya-Dvadashi Vrata
